teaser: You know what happens at the end of the week by now, right? Silicon Tally, the game where Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson and a worthy adversary try and stump each other with numbers from the week's tech news. Today it's Cory Doctorow, awesome science fiction author and co-editor of the group blog Boing Boing. Plus, Reddit's gift exchange.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, November 29, 2013
description: You know what happens at the end of the week by now, right? Silicon Tally, the game where Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson and a worthy adversary try and stump each other with numbers from the week's tech news. Today it's Cory Doctorow, awesome science fiction author and co-editor of the group blog Boing Boing. Plus, Reddit's gift exchange.
